name: Untitled Ball Game (Elektropapst)
description:
My very first (short) Godot game, made for the KenneyJam2021 using only Kenney's assets. Check his page out now: https://kenney.nl/

I was highly inspired by Kenney's latest progress with Godot, so I decided to replace libGDX with Godot this time and learn something new. Unfortunately I had some other appointments this weekend, so time was not my best friend. I actually managed to "design" only three levels (if you even call design though lol). But, I would say i reached my goal and learned something new!

Have fun with the game:

KeyActionAMove Left
DMove Right
W or Space
Jump

Thank you for playing!
